question1: Do you offer a free trial?
answer1: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial. You can cancel at any time during the trial period and you won't be charged.
answer2: You can cancel your subscription at any time. You can do this from your account settings.
question3: Where can I find my invoices?
answer3: You can find your invoices in your account settings.
question4: What payment methods do you accept?
answer4: We accept all major credit cards and PayPal.
question5: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
answer5: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. You can do this from your account settings.
question6: Do you offer discounts for non-profits?
answer6: Yes, we offer a 50% discount for non-profits. Please contact us to learn more.
